attributes.title: WHY IS IT JUST ORANGE!
attributes.review: I tried to open the app but the whole screen is just orange! I really want to support our Cheeto god in this years election but can’t even use the app😔 0/10 please fix this!

attributes.title: ✨rats✨
attributes.review: It was terrible took months do download and when I’d did it played music that called rats and roaches and then the rats and roches sacrificed my house to trump by burning it down and now I live in a tree house

attributes.title: The worst app ever 🤮🤮
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever, it crashes all the time and it’s dumb. Plus trump and the trump administration thinks that they can take down tik tok, then they are going down with us how about that 🙄😬🤮

I got this app and then my cat died immediately after (she was black btw) honestly kinda of hurt. i was a trump supporter before this all happened but i was an even bigger cat supporter. i’m voting blue now

attributes.title: Why
attributes.review: The app took 2 months to download and then i couldn’t open the app and all my other apps did the same

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: Ever since I downloaded this app my phone has been functioning VERY SLOW. My battery dies at 20% and I keep getting emails asking to donate money to build a WALL???? I’m very confused and will be writing a strongly worded letter to CORPORATE!!!!

this really made me mad, the app actually took 2 and half weeks to fully download and almost every time i open it it glitches and takes me back to the home screen. i also noticed when it does let me on the app my phone battery goes down about 10% every 2 minutes.

attributes.title: Worst app in history
attributes.review: This app is terrible it literally made my cousin kill herself it took 1 week to download it even cut off my WiFi even my sprint phone

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This just is that bad it takes forever to download I don’t think we should have to put our number in

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: As soon a s I downloaded the app my phone was glitching really bad  and just the app design was horrible would not recommend
